Name: Coptic textile
Description: A tapestry medallion in wool and linen. The motif is a leaf with buds and a formal plant design in the centre, in red, blue and orange.Technique: plain weave ground, tapestry motif with built up shapes, curved weft and slits.Ends per inch (warp threads): 40, doubled over tapestry.Picks per inch (weft threads): 48 over ground, 96 over tapestry.
